mapper.select: SELECT pc.id,pc.name,pc.opening_cost from pay_channels pc LEFT JOIN goods_pay_channels gpc on gpc.pay_channel_id=pc.id where gpc.good_id=#{goodId} and pc.status=5 and pc.id in (SELECT sa.id from support_areas sa where sa.city_id=#{city_id} and sa.support_type=1)
SELECT id,url_path from goods_pictures where good_id=#{id}
SELECT count(*) from good_comments where good_id=#{id} and verify_type=1
